FOUND IN: Garden of Eden - The original dwelling place for Adam and Eve according to the Bible, symbolizing paradise on Earth.
Crude - not yet processed or developed; primitive and uncultured.
Walk - A leisurely or casual way to move from one place to another by foot.
**Oddball** - An unconventional and quirky individual who stands out due to their uniqueness.
The Edge - Guitarist and main songwriter for U2, recognized for his unique playing style and innovative use of effects pedals.
Ferric (containing iron in its +3 oxidation state)
Thomas Edison - Known for his invention of the light bulb and phonograph.
